headline: Autodesk’s Q3 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: Autodesk’s third quarter saw notable outperformance, with results surpassing Wall Street’s expectations and a positive market reaction. Management attributed this performance to robust customer adoption across architecture, engineering, construction, and manufacturing, especially amid ongoing investment in data centers and infrastructure projects. CEO Andrew Anagnost credited the company’s ongoing transition to cloud-based platforms and the growing integration of artificial intelligence as key c
